overview:
Rogier van Duyn founded Statsground January 2012. Working as the New Business Director for Dutch broadcaster SBS Broadcasting in 2010, Van Duyn identified the lack of media analysis tools for advertisers that want to monitor the online impact of radio & TV advertising. Statsground is a web application that analyses existing data sources Google Analytics and all radio & TV broadcast schedules. As a result it advises which periods, programs and channels generate the highest online conversion.

Previously Van Duyn founded in 2004 mobile blog platform Mobypicture, in 2007 mobile app developer Sharewire and in 2011 green energy group buying platform metdestroommee.nl and 5 Oceans a boutique media agency.

He holds an MBA with a minor in International Management and in 2011 successfully finished the masterclass Financing the Entrepreneurial Business at the London Business School.

Van Duyn holds a board seat in the Health[e] Foundation, a non-profit organization that developed an USB stick training program for health workers in Third World countries.
